支繞: (えだにょう) - kanji "branch" radical as enclosure
支那: (シナ) - (often considered offensive post-WWII, esp. when written in kanji)  China
支那チベット語族: (しなチベットごぞく) - Sino-Tibetan (family of languages)
支那チベット諸語: (しなチベットしょご) - Sino-Tibetan languages
支那実桜: (シナミザクラ) - Chinese sour cherry (Prunus pseudocerasus)
支那竹: (しなちく) - bamboo shoots boiled, sliced, fermented, dried or preserved in salt, then soaked in hot water and sea salt
支那薄色海豚: (シナウスイロイルカ) - Chinese white dolphin (Sousa chinensis chinensis)
支那蛤: (シナハマグリ) - Meretrix petechialis (species of hard clam)
支那連ぎょう: (シナレンギョウ) - Chinese golden bells; Forsythia Vahl
支那連翹: (シナレンギョウ) - Chinese golden bells; Forsythia Vahl
支配: (shihai) - domination, rule, control; direction, management, guidance , domination, rule, control; direction, management, guidance; control (por exemplo, sobre as próprias emoções), determining (e.g. one's fate), governing, influence, holding sway over
支配下: (しはいか) - under control (e.g. of territory)
支配体制: (しはいたいせい) - system of government
支配方程式: (しはいほうていしき) - governing equation
支配株: (しはいかぶ) - controlling stock; majority shares
支配権: (しはいけん) - right of control; supremacy; sovereignty
支配的地位: (しはいてきちい) - driver's seat; dominant position
支配階級: (しはいかいきゅう) - ruling class(es)
支離滅裂: (しりめつれつ) - (yoji) incoherent; inconsistent; illogical; disorderly; confused; nonsensical
攴繞: (ぼくにょう) - (as in 攷 and 敍) kanji "strike" radical at right (radical 66)
攵繞: (ぼくにょう) - (as in 攷 and 敍) kanji "strike" radical at right (radical 66)
改ざん検出: (かいざんけんしゅつ) - manipulation detection
改まる: (あらたまる) - to be renewed; to stand on ceremony/to be formal; to take a turn for the worse
改む: (あらたむ) - to revise; to change
改め: (あらため) - former (e.g. name); previous; changed
改めて: (aratamete) - outra vez, de novo, novamente, mais uma vez, de novo; formalmente, especialmente, intencionalmente, deliberadamente
改める: (あらためる) - (改める, 革める only)  to change/to alter/to revise/to replace; (改める, 革める only) to reform/to correct/to mend/to improve; (改める, 検める only) to examine/to check/to inspect; (改める, 革める only) to do properly/to do formally
改ページ: (かいページ) - repagination; new page; form feed; page break
改修工事: (かいしゅうこうじ) - repair work
改号: (かいごう) - change of name or title; change of era
改善: (kaizen) - betterment, improvement; kaizen (Filosofia empresarial japonesa de melhoria contínua)
改善点: (かいぜんてん) - points of improvement/improved areas; points needing improvement/problem areas
改姓: (かいせい) - changing one's family name
改宗者: (かいそうしゃ) - a convert (e.g. to Buddhism)
改定: (かいじょう) - revision (of a rule, price, etc.); reform; alteration; change
改心: (かいしん) - conversion; reform; correcting someone's conduct
改心者: (かいしんしゃ) - convert; person converted to a religion or belief
改悪: (かいあく) - deterioration; changing for the worse
改暦: (かいれき) - calendar revision (e.g. at start of year)
改札係: (かいさつがかり) - ticket examiner (collector, inspector) (in a railroad station)
改札口: (かいさつぐち) - ticket barrier (gate); wicket
改機: (かいき) - (海気 only) sea air/sea breeze; (海気 only) ocean and atmosphere; type of yarn-dyed silk goods
改正案: (かいせいあん) - reform bill; reform proposal
改版理由: (かいはんりゆう) - reason for revision; reason for modification
改稿: (かいこう) - revising (e.g. manuscript)/rewriting; revised manuscript
改築: (かいちく) - structural alteration of building; reconstruction
